events.name: Live Cooking Show & Bloodletting Destruction Ritual* with The Satanic Chef
events.description: Participants in the ritual submitted names to be destroyed live. Cooking workshop to follow, inspired by the Satanic Planet album.

events.name: Unbaptism and DJ Set with Shiva Honey
events.description: Following the Group Unbaptism, join Priestess Shiva for a live DJ set

events.name: Sharing the Planet: Band Inspired Art
events.description: A menagerie of SP! Come watch Grey Faction director Evan Anderson's video compilation of Grey Masses for Satanic Planet's track, 'Grey Faction.' Lucien shares some found footage. Drag performance by Die Schwarze Frau and illustrations by Naomi Rubin.

events.name: Satanic Planet Jukebox
events.description: Listen to the new tracks on the Satanic Planet album on our jukebox!

events.name: Merch Table
events.description: Shop merch, vinyl and CDs from the band

events.name: Interview of Satanic Planet's Music Videos Directors with La Carmina
events.description: Join La Carmina and the music video directors for the first Satanic Planet album including Eric Livingston (song: Satanic Planet) and Neil Edwards (song: Liturgy)
